title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry bacon until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cheese together.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture.
Serve with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
ingredients: 1/2 cup heavy cream or coconut milk
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or sauté the chicken until half cooked; set aside.
In a pot, melt butter and sauté onions until soft.
Add garlic, ginger, and spices, then cook for 1–2 minutes.
Pour in tomato puree and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add grilled chicken and cook on medium heat for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and simmer until thick and creamy.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Fried Rice
summary: Fluffy rice stir-fried with vegetables, eggs, and spices.
ingredients: 1 tbsp sesame oil or vegetable oil
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and scramble the eggs; set aside.
Add more oil and sauté onions and garlic until fragrant.
Add mixed vegetables and cook for 2–3 minutes.
Add cooked rice and stir well to combine.
Season with soy sauce, salt, and pepper.
Add scrambled eggs back into the pan and mix.
Serve hot as a main dish or side.
